text: “Ndipo kwa Asamudu tidamtumiza m’bale wawo Swaleh. Adati: “E inu anthu anga! Gwadirani Allah; inu mulibe mulungu wina koma Iye basi. Chizindikiro chochokera kwa Mbuye wanu chadza kwa inu. Iyi ndi ngamira ya Allah monga chisonyezo chanu (chizizwa chanu), choncho, isiyeni izidya m’dziko la Allah, ndipo musaikhudze ndi choipa kuopera kuti chingakugwereni chilango chowawa kwambiri.”
